# ebt
This is backup script.
It can backup:
* LVM volumes
* BTRFS subvolumes with `btrfs send`
* Any files with rsync
* MySQL with mysqldump
* Mysql with xtrabackup
* Libvirt VM with LVM
* Libvirt VM with qemu snapshots

Features:
* Old backups cleaner
* Flexible architecture. You can combinate any steps.
